geoQuery.query: WITH l AS (SELECT ln.line_id ID ,1 P_ID ,CASE WHEN c.z_coord IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.z_coord END Y ,sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin - {START_KM} X ,' '::TEXT "LABEL" ,row_number() over (ORDER BY sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin) rwn FROM pods.line ln JOIN pods.route r ON r.line_id = ln.line_id AND r.type_cl = CASE ln.type_cl WHEN 'LINE_TYPE_01' THEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_10' WHEN 'LINE_TYPE_02' THEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_11' WHEN 'LINE_TYPE_03' THEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_12' WHEN 'LINE_TYPE_04' THEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_04' END JOIN pods.series s ON s.route_id = r.route_id JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.series_id = s.series_id JOIN pods.LOCATION l ON l.location_id = sp.location_id JOIN pods.coordinate c ON c.location_id = l.location_id WHERE ln.line_id = {LINE_ID} AND l.srv_district_gcl in ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER}) AND c.z_coord IS NOT NULL AND sp.type_cl IN ('ST_POINT_TYPE_01', 'ST_POINT_TYPE_02', 'ST_POINT_TYPE_03') AND (sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin) >= {START_KM} AND (sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin) <= {FINISH_KM} ORDER BY sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin) select ID, P_ID, X,0 Y, "LABEL" from l where rwn=1 union all select ID, P_ID, X,Y, "LABEL" from l union all select ID, P_ID, X,0 Y, "LABEL" from l where l.x = (select max(X) from l) union all select ID, P_ID, X,0 Y, "LABEL" from l where rwn=1

SELECT ln.line_id ID ,1 P_ID ,l.depth_of_cover Y ,sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin - {START_KM} X ,' '::TEXT "LABEL" FROM pods.line ln JOIN pods.route r ON r.line_id = ln.line_id AND r.type_cl = CASE ln.type_cl WHEN 'LINE_TYPE_01' THEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_10' WHEN 'LINE_TYPE_02' THEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_11' WHEN 'LINE_TYPE_03' THEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_12' WHEN 'LINE_TYPE_04' THEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_04' END JOIN pods.series s ON s.route_id = r.route_id JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.series_id = s.series_id JOIN pods.LOCATION l ON l.location_id = sp.location_id WHERE ln.line_id = {LINE_ID} AND l.depth_of_cover IS NOT NULL AND l.srv_district_gcl in ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER}) AND sp.type_cl IN ('ST_POINT_TYPE_01', 'ST_POINT_TYPE_02', 'ST_POINT_TYPE_03') AND (sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin) >= {START_KM} AND (sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin) <= {FINISH_KM} ORDER BY sp.measure / 1000 + s.station_begin
